remarks.para: Associated lavatory system(s) may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated components are deactivated or isolated to prevent leaks,
Pilot-in-Command will determine if flight duration is acceptable with a FWD lavatory unusable, and
Associated lavatory door(s) is secured closed and placarded "INOPERATIVE - DO NOT ENTER".

note.para: These provisions are not intended to prohibit inspections by crewmembers.

placard.para: Placard lav door "LAV INOP – DO NOT ENTER" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Drain waste tank and leave empty.
Placard exterior Lav Servicing Panel "INOP WASTE TANK TO REMAIN EMPTY" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Open and collar flush motor circuit breaker (P11S25).
Associated lavatory door is secured closed.
